scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.release: VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git add -u && git commit -m "release $VERSION" && git tag $VERSION && git push origin $VERSION && npm run docs:publish && npm publish
scripts.docs: rm -rf docs && jsdoc -c jsdoc.json -d docs && npm run allure:report
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs && git add docs && git commit -m "update docs" && git push origin master
scripts.allure:report: npm run test:cover && allure generate report/allure --report-dir ./docs/allure-report
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
